info.headline: Avalanche Watch issued February 27 at 7:17PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Forest Service Idaho Panhandle Avalanche Center Sandpoint ID ...The Forest Service Idaho Panhandle Avalanche Center Sandpoint ID has issued a Backcountry Avalanche Watch... * WHAT...The avalanche danger is expected to rise to HIGH. * WHERE...For the Kootenai. * WHEN...In effect until 7 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Heavy, wet snow combined with wind will likely create widespread areas of unstable snow.
info.instruction: Very dangerous avalanche conditions may develop. It may become prudent to avoid travel in avalanche terrain. Avalanches may run long distances and can run into mature forests, valley floors, or flat terrain. Consult www.idahopanhandleavalanche.org or www.avalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of any Avalanche Center.
